trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for custom ASP.NET Web Parts controls, adding to the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> class features some additional user interface (UI) properties, the ability to create connections, and personalization behavior.
trans-unit.target: 用作自定义 ASP.NET Web 部件控件，将添加到基基类<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref>类提供了一些附加用户界面 (UI) 属性，能够创建连接，以及个性化行为。

trans-unit.source: When you create controls with Web Parts functionality, you have two basic options.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建具有 Web 部件功能的控件时，你具有两个基本选项。

trans-unit.source: You can create custom controls that derive from the WebPart class, or you can create or use other server controls.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建自定义控件派生自的 web 部件类中，也可以创建或使用其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Existing ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls can all be given full Web Parts functionality by declaring them within (or adding them programmatically to) a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone control, with the result that they will be wrapped with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> objects at run time and treated as true WebPart controls.
trans-unit.target: 现有的 ASP.NET 控件、 自定义服务器控件和用户控件可以对所有可指定完整的 Web 部件功能通过声明内为这些 （或将它们添加到以编程方式）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域控件，结果是它们将与包装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象在运行时间和处理作为 true web 部件控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For speed of development and maximum reuse of code, using existing server controls can be a good option.
trans-unit.target: 有关开发速度和最大限度重用，使用现有的服务器控件可以是代码的一个不错的选择。

trans-unit.source: For maximum programmatic control over the behavior and Web Parts functionality of controls, creating a custom control that inherits from the WebPart class is often the best option.
trans-unit.target: 对于对的行为和 Web 部件功能的控件的最大进行编程控制，创建从 web 部件类继承的自定义控件通常是最佳选项。

trans-unit.source: The abstract WebPart class inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> control and provides the basic elements for all WebPart controls.
trans-unit.target: 抽象的 web 部件类继承自基类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>控件并提供的所有 web 部件控件的基本元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>

trans-unit.source: The class includes a common set of properties that affect the appearance of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 该类包括一组通用的影响的用户界面的外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> properties each specify whether the user of a Web application is permitted to interact with the part control in the way indicated by the given property name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>每个属性指定是否允许 Web 应用程序的用户与部分的控件，通过给定的属性名称所指示的方式进行交互。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> properties determine the size, visibility, appearance, and supporting content (such as a title and a description) for a WebPart control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>属性确定大小、 可见性、 外观和支持内容 （如标题和说明） 的 web 部件控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The relationship of a WebPart control to its context within the Web Parts control set is determined by properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>, which holds a reference to the control's associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>, which references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件与 Web 部件控件集如由属性在其上下文中的关系<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>，它保存对控件的引用的关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>对象，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>，后者引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>包含该控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: There can be only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control per page, and each instance of a WebPart control can reside within only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> at a time.
trans-unit.target: 可能只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>每页上，以及每个实例的 web 部件控件可以驻留在只有一个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>一次。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A WebPart control can be placed outside of a zone on a Web page, but in this case it functions as a normal server control and loses nearly all Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> web 部件控件可以放置在网页上，区域之外，但在这种情况下它的函数作为正常的服务器控件和丢失几乎所有 Web 部件功能。

trans-unit.source: Several other important properties affect unique features of WebPart controls.
trans-unit.target: 其他几个重要属性会影响 web 部件控件的唯一的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property allows developers to set an arbitrary string that can be used as a filter at run time to determine whether a control is added to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性允许开发人员设置可以用作筛选器在运行时以确定是否将控件添加到页面的任意字符串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Used together with a feature such as role management, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property provides a useful mechanism for creating views based on defined user roles.
trans-unit.target: 与角色管理，如功能结合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>属性提供有用的机制，用于创建基于定义的用户角色的视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property indicates whether, during an export, all the available property data on a control is exported, or only the non-sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>属性指示是否在导出期间，在控件上的所有可用的属性数据导出，或仅非敏感数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows developers to distinguish between data that is sensitive and data that is not, for security purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这样，开发人员来区分是敏感的数据和不是，出于安全目的的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property returns a reference to an instance of a WebPart control, so that an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control can edit it when the page is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A>属性返回到 web 部件控件的实例的引用，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制当页面处于编辑模式时可以编辑它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebBrowsableObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, there are several properties that indicate the status of the control relative to the rest of the page.
trans-unit.target: 最后，有几个属性指示相对于页的其余部分的控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property indicates whether a control is closed (and thus added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> object), or if it is open and available on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>属性指示控件是否已关闭 (并因此添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>对象)，或如果它已打开并且可在页面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property indicates whether a control is a shared control (versus a user-specific control), meaning that it is visible to all users of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>属性指示控件是否为共享的控件 （而不是特定于用户的控件），这意味着它对 Web 页的所有用户可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property indicates whether a control is currently contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>-derived zone (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>属性指示控件当前是否包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>-派生区域 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` indicates the control is inside a zone and thus has full Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: 值为`false`指示该控件处于区域内，因此不具有完整的 Web 部件功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property indicates whether a control is static or dynamic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>属性指示控件是否是静态或动态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: A static control is declared in the markup of a Web page, whereas a dynamic control is added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 而动态控制以编程方式添加的网页，标记中声明静态控件。

trans-unit.source: The WebPart class also provides several methods that determine what happens at various points in the control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件类还提供了确定发生的情况不同的时间点在控件的生命周期中的几种方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged%2A> methods can both be overridden in a derived class to provide programmatic control over the rendering of a control's contents during the event that corresponds to each method's name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged%2A>方法都可在重写派生类提供对控件的内容的每个方法的名称对应的事件执行过程的呈现进行编程控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from WebPart can add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 从 web 部件派生的类可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: The verbs are rendered in a verbs menu, which appears in the title bar of a WebPart control.
trans-unit.target: 谓词呈现在谓词菜单中，在 web 部件控件的标题栏中显示。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provide simple UI elements for common user actions such as hiding or minimizing the control or displaying Help.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>对象提供常见的用户操作，如隐藏或最小化控件或显示帮助的简单 UI 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A> method creates a collection of any custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls that are associated with a WebPart control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法创建的任何自定义集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>与 web 部件控件相关联的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can override this method so that it creates custom controls designed specifically to edit their WebPart control.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以重写此方法，以便它将创建专用于编辑其 web 部件控件的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a WebPart control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击上 web 部件控件的编辑谓词时调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化继承的类实例使用的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: The WebPart constructor initializes default values for several UI-oriented properties, including the various `Allow` properties that determine the control's capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件构造函数初始化默认值为面向用户界面的多个属性，包括各种`Allow`确定控件的功能的属性。

trans-unit.source: These properties are then incorporated into an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性然后并入继承的类实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an end user can close a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以关闭<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>在网页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: After a user closes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control on a Web page, the control is no longer visible or available on the page.
trans-unit.target: 用户关闭后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在网页上，控件不再是可见还是的页上提供。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The closed control is added to the page catalog, a Web Parts entity that stores a reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件添加到页目录中，将存储对控件的引用的 Web 部件实体。

trans-unit.source: If a developer adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control to the page within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control, users are able to switch the page to catalog display mode, select the closed control in the page catalog, and add it back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员添加了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控件添加到内的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控件，用户就能够将页面切换到目录的显示模式，在页目录中，选择已关闭的控件并将其添加回页面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be added back to a page either programmatically, or by a user who selects the closed control from the page catalog when the page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可以添加回页面通过编程方式，或从页目录中选择已关闭的控件，如果页已在目录中的用户显示模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Closing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is different from deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件是不同于删除它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A closed control can be added back to a page, while a deleted control is permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件可以添加回页面中，而永久删除已删除的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on deleting controls, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 删除控件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: Closing a control is also different from hiding it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭控件也是不同于隐藏的。

trans-unit.source: A control that is hidden is still present on the page, still participates in page life cycle events, and is only hidden from the user's view, but a closed control is not even rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: 但仍会出现在页上，仍参与页面生命周期事件，并从用户的视图，只会隐藏已关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页上，隐藏的控件。

trans-unit.source: Both static and dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls (static controls are declared in a page's markup, while dynamic controls are added programmatically) can be closed.
trans-unit.target: 静态和动态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以关闭 （静态控件声明在页面的标记中，在以编程方式添加动态控件） 的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If a developer sets the AllowClose property to `false`, a close verb does not appear on the control, and the user is not able to close the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员将 AllowClose 属性设置为`false`、 关闭谓词未出现在该控件，并且用户不是能够关闭控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can be closed on a Web page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件可以在网页上; 关闭否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control allows other controls to form connections with it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制允许与它建立连接的其他控件。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be set declaratively in page markup, or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 在页标记中，或以编程方式，可以以声明方式设置的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether connections can be formed with the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否可以与此控件形成连接。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an end user can modify a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control through the user interface (UI) provided by one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以修改<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制通过用户界面 (UI) 提供的一个或多个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: To allow end users to edit a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the AllowEdit property must be set to `true` (the default), and the page's display mode must be in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许最终用户能够编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>AllowEdit 属性必须设置为控件， `true` （默认值）、 和页的显示模式必须处于编辑模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Display modes are represented by fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式中的字段由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the mode is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下的模式是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: For details about page display modes and how to change them, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 模式和如何更改它们，将显示有关页面的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类概述。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: When the AllowEdit property is set to `false` either declaratively or programmatically, editing options are limited.
trans-unit.target: 当 AllowEdit 属性设置为`false`编辑选项以声明方式或以编程方式，将受到限制。

trans-unit.source: The only possible editing operations are changes to the page's layout, using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, or other basic operations enabled through custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 可能的编辑操作仅对该页面的布局更改，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控件或通过自定义启用其他基本操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For an example that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls from the Web Parts control set and shows how to enable editing of a custom Web Parts control, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Web Parts Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件从 Web 部件控件集，并演示如何启用编辑自定义 Web 部件控件，请参阅[演练︰ 创建 Web 部件页](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The effect that the AllowEdit property has on a control's behavior is also impacted by the current personalization scope of the Web page, and the individual Web Parts controls on that page.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> AllowEdit 属性上控件的行为的影响由当前的个性化设置范围的网页上，也会受到影响和该页面上的单个 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control can be modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件均可以是已修改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users are allowed to hide a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许最终用户隐藏<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The AllowHide property determines whether users can modify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: AllowHide 属性确定用户是否可以修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the default case, when the property value is `true`, users can change the value when the control is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当属性值为`true`，正在编辑的控件时，用户可以更改的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, controls are not hidden and their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未隐藏控件及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性值是`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being edited, if a user selects a check box to hide the control (which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property to `true`), the control will no longer be visible when the page returns to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>所编辑的控件，如果用户选择一个复选框以隐藏控件 (哪些集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性`true`)，该控件将不再可见时将页返回到浏览模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Hidden controls are distinct from controls that are closed, because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> property has a distinct meaning within the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的控件有别于控件均已关闭，因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>属性具有不同的含义在 Web 部件控件集内。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>

trans-unit.source: Closed controls are not even rendered on a page, and do not participate in page life cycle events.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页中，并不参与页面生命周期事件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, while hidden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are not visible to users, they are still rendered on a Web page, are still contained in a zone, and can still maintain connections with other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls as part of a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 相反，而隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件没有对用户可见，它们仍呈现在网页上，是否仍包含在区域中，并仍保持与其他连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件作为 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件均可以是隐藏的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users can minimize a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户可以最大程度减少<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The AllowMinimize property, if set to `false`, prevents an end user from being able to minimize the control, and the user interface (UI) for minimizing the control does not appear in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: AllowMinimize 属性中，如果设置为`false`，防止最终用户能够以最小化控件，以及用户界面 (UI) 的最小化控件未显示在控件的标题栏中。

trans-unit.source: In Web Parts terminology, when the AllowMinimize property is set to `false`, the minimize verb does not appear on the control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件术语中，当 AllowMinimize 属性设置为`false`，最小化谓词不会不会出现在控件的谓词菜单。

trans-unit.source: When a user minimizes a control, it reduces the control's size down to a minimal area that displays only part of the control's title bar and title.
trans-unit.target: 当用户最小化控件时，它减少了下显示仅的控件的标题栏和标题的一部分的最小区域控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>和仅授权用户可以修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control can be minimized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件均可以是最小化; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can move a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zones.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以将移动<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制之间<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: When the AllowZoneChange property is `true`, and a Web page is in a display mode that allows layout changes (such as edit or design mode), a user can change the page layout by moving a control to another <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当 AllowZoneChange 属性是`true`，和 Web 页处于允许布局更改 （如编辑或设计模式） 的显示模式下时，用户可以通过将控件移到另一个更改页面布局<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>页上的区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, a control cannot be moved between zones, but can still be moved within its current zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性设置为`false`，则控件不能区域，之间移动，但仍可以在其当前的区域内移动。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件可以移动之间区域; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an arbitrary string to determine whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is authorized to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个任意字符串，以确定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件是否有权添加到页。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the AuthorizationFilter property.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集未实现 AuthorizationFilter 属性任何默认行为。

trans-unit.source: However, the property is provided so that you can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 但是，以便你可以将任意字符串值分配给自定义提供该属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件; 由检查此属性可以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>期间控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>事件，以确定是否可以将控件添加到页面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the AuthorizationFilter property might be used with the ASP.NET role manager feature, so that if a user is in a certain role, and if the string value of the AuthorizationFilter property meets certain conditions set by the developer, then the control can be added.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，AuthorizationFilter 属性可能能使用 ASP.NET 角色管理器功能，以便如果用户位于某一特定角色，并且如果 AuthorizationFilter 属性的字符串值满足某些设置由开发人员的条件，控件可被添加。

trans-unit.source: This approach allows developers to create custom views of a page based on a combination of roles and other authorization criteria that they specify.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许开发人员创建的基于角色和它们指定其他授权条件的组合的页的自定义视图。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>和仅授权用户可以修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: A string that authorizes a control to be added to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 一个授权控件添加到 Web 页的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: 表示用于表示目录中的控件的图像的 URL 的字符串。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The internal validation system has determined that the URL might contain script attacks.
trans-unit.target: 在内部验证系统已确定的 URL 可能包含脚本攻击。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a part control is in a minimized or normal state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个部分的控件是否处于最小化或正常状态。

trans-unit.source: A part control's ChromeState property value can be normal or minimized.
trans-unit.target: 一个部分的控件的 ChromeState 属性值可以是正常或最小化。

trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that frames a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的框架 Web 部件控件的边框类型。

trans-unit.source: A part control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A> property determines what kind of border surrounds the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个部分的控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>属性确定哪种类型的边框环绕控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.WebPartManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: Options include showing a title only, a border only, a title and border, neither, or the default option, which simply uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选项包括显示标题、 只、 仅边框、 标题和边框，两者，或只需使用的值的默认选项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overrides the base property so that end users can personalize it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类重写基属性，以便最终用户可以个性化它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.target: 有关使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅文章<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an error message to display to users if errors occur during the connection process.
trans-unit.target: 获取连接过程中发生错误时，向用户显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The content of the ConnectErrorMessage property is supplied internally by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集内部提供将 ConnectErrorMessage 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message.
trans-unit.target: 包含错误消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls that can be used to edit a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回的自定义集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>可以用于编辑的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制当它处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Developers can use this method to create instances of custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls that they want to associate with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以使用此方法创建的自定义实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>他们想要将与相关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击编辑谓词时调用该方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Any new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control that is created in this method must have a value assigned to its ID property before it can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的任何新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>在此方法中创建的控件必须具有之前将它添加到分配给其 ID 属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example that uses the CreateEditorParts method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用 CreateEditorParts 方法的代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类概述。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含自定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>与关联的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what the part control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of part controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个短语，总结了一部分控件的作用，在工具提示和部件控件的目录中使用。

trans-unit.source: The Description property is typically a string that is used in catalogs that provide lists of part controls, and as a ToolTip in the part control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: Description 属性通常是提供列表的一部分控件，以及部件控件的标题栏中的工具提示的目录中使用的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The content of the Description property appears in a ToolTip when you position your mouse pointer over the title text in a part control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针放置在一个部分的控件的标题栏中的标题文本，Description 属性的内容将显示在工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text is created from the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property, followed by a hyphen, followed by the Description property value.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示文本创建的值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性后, 接一个连字符后, 跟说明属性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a code example that uses this property, see the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅文章<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>和仅授权用户可以修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that briefly summarizes the part control's functionality.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，简要概述部件控件的功能。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal direction that content flows within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件内流内容的水平方向。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overrides the base property values so that ends users can personalize the property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类重写基属性值，以便最终用户可以对属性进行个性化设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection"></xref> that indicates the horizontal direction content will flow.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection"> </xref> ，该值指示水平方向内容将流动。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the full title text actually displayed in the title bar of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，包含实际的标题栏中显示的完整的标题文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件实例。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property returns either the current value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: DisplayTitle 属性返回的当前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性或如果控件具有没有标题，计算得出的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls, plus (if there are multiple controls within the zone) a number based on the index of the control within the zone.
trans-unit.target: 计算的值由无标题控件的可本地化的资源字符串和一个数字 （如果有该区域内的多个控件） 根据该区域中的控件索引。

trans-unit.source: For custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> property has been overridden to return a string value to use as a subtitle, the DisplayTitle property is concatenated with the subtitle to produce a complete title.
trans-unit.target: 为自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制在何处<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A>属性已被重写以返回一个字符串值可用作副标题、 DisplayTitle 属性串联在一起副标题以生成一个完整的标题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Subtitle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property value also serves as part of a ToolTip that appears when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title bar of a control.
trans-unit.target: DisplayTitle 属性值还用作工具提示时用户将鼠标指针定位控件的标题栏上显示的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The full ToolTip consists of the DisplayTitle value, followed by a hyphen, followed by the value of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 完整的工具提示包含 DisplayTitle 值后, 跟连字符后, 跟控件的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, displayed title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示完整的显示的控件的标题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether all, some, or none of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control's properties can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否所有，部分，或任何<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>可以导出控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be exported and its ExportMode property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>无法导出控件和其 ExportMode 属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To enable exporting all properties for the control, set the ExportMode value to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用导出控件的所有属性，设置到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode> ExportMode 值

trans-unit.source: To export only certain properties while preventing the export of properties that contain sensitive data, you set the property value to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在防止的导出的属性包含敏感数据的同时导出仅某些属性，你设置到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>的属性值

trans-unit.source: To export property value descriptions for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the properties must also be marked with the `Personalizable` attribute in the metadata for the property's source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要导出的属性值说明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，属性也必须标记与`Personalizable`属性的源代码的元数据中的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To enable the export feature for a Web application that includes Web Parts controls, in the Web.config file for your application, you must add an attribute to the `<webParts>` element within the `<system.web>` section, as in the following markup.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要启用的 Web 应用程序在你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中包含 Web 部件控件使用导出功能，你必须添加到一个特性`<webParts>`中的元素`<system.web>`部分中，如下所示的以下标记。

trans-unit.source: > > `<webParts enableExport="true">` > > `</webParts>` This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: >> `<webParts enableExport="true">` >>`</webParts>`主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>和仅授权用户可以修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The control is already loaded and the personalization scope of the control is set to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: 已加载的控件和控件的个性化设置范围设置为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>作用域。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has any shared personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件具有与之关联的任何共享的个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: This property refers to personalization data that is set on a control in shared scope, meaning personalization data that is seen by all users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是指设置控件在共享范围内，这意味着个性化数据看到的所有用户的个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示控件是否已共享个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has any user personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件具有与之关联的任何用户个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: This property refers to custom personalization data that is user-specific -- in other words, specific settings by a user on a control that are visible only to that user.
trans-unit.target: 此属性引用自定义个性化设置用户的特定于数据-换而言之，用户在控件上仅对该用户可见的特定设置。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control has any user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示控件是否有任何用户个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer rendering modes can affect the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and the height of the zone that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 呈现模式可能会影响的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和小标题的高度，该字符串包含它。 该区域</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>的高度

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer renders Web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions) or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page).
trans-unit.target: 在兼容模式 （与以前的浏览器版本的向后兼容） 中或在标准模式下，Internet Explorer 呈现网页 (由存在`DOCTYPE`在页中的声明)。

trans-unit.source: For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property.
trans-unit.target: 有关这些模式的信息，请参阅 DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)属性。

trans-unit.source: When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, under some circumstances it might not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is `<td height="100%">`.
trans-unit.target: 当 Internet Explorer 呈现标准模式中的页时，在某些情况下它可能不调整单元格大小在表中，即使在单元格的 HTML 标记`<td height="100%">`。

trans-unit.source: As a result, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和其包含的区域呈现，因此，控件不会拉伸到该区域的最大高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: When Internet Explorer is in standard mode, controls do not render to stretch to their full height in the following cases: - When a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> and you explicitly set the height on the zone.
trans-unit.target: 在标准模式下 Internet 资源管理器时，不呈现控件能够扩展到其完整的高度，在以下情况:-当区域的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>且在区域上显式设置的高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontally oriented zone.
trans-unit.target: 要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，不要指定水平方向区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: - When a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone or of the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: -当区域的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>和未显式设置区域的或的所含控件的高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertically oriented zone.
trans-unit.target: 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，垂直方向的区域中设置的区域或控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object that indicates the height of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>对象，指示的高度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default type of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> is pixels, as indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>将像素，如所示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of user interface (UI) used to display Help content for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来显示帮助内容的用户界面 (UI) 的类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HelpMode property to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control.
trans-unit.target: HelpMode 属性用于确定如何浏览器将显示为控件的帮助内容。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the effects of the various Help modes on a browser when Help content for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了各种帮助模式在浏览器上的结果的帮助内容时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>显示控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: |Help mode|Browser behavior| |---------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>|Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.
trans-unit.target: |帮助模式 |浏览器的行为 | |---------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>|打开一个单独的浏览器窗口中，如果浏览器具有此功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>

trans-unit.source: A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>|Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability.
trans-unit.target: 用户必须在返回到 Web 部件页之前关闭该窗口。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>|打开一个单独的浏览器窗口中，如果浏览器具有此功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>

trans-unit.source: A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>|Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.| This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 用户不必在返回到 Web 页之前关闭窗口。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>|替换在浏览器窗口中的 Web 部件页面。 | 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>和仅授权用户可以修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>和[Web 部件个性化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartHelpMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a Help file for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的帮助文件的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: To enable a verb menu with a help verb in the verbs menu of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, you must provide a value for the HelpUrl property.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用的谓词菜单中的帮助动词与谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，你必须为 HelpUrl 属性提供一个值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The manner in which the Help content is displayed in the browser is determined by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器中显示的帮助内容所用的方式确定的值由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope of this property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> and can be modified only by authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的个性化作用域设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>和仅授权用户可以修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>
